text: Updates are synced from GitHub via webhooks... so it should happen almost immediately... but we say 24 hours just in case :slightly_smiling_face: #patience :upside_down_face:

Helping to answer the common question “How do I build a custom menu using the `menu()` function”
>-Adrian C. Black contributed “CSS-only HubSpot multi-level Responsive nav”
>-Check it out :point_right::skin-tone-2: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery/entry/founders/adriancblack-css-only-HubSpot-responsive-multi-level-nav?hsLang=en>
>-(Make sure to upvote it in the Code Gallery if you like it)
